title: cmd/*: darwin build fails with "unexpected R_TLS_LE relocation for darwin"
body:
https://go.googlesource.com/go/+/264858c46e9daa819d6230f6907b750a3dd9b14f breaks all darwin builds.
```
go/build
cmd/go
2015/04/26 04:16:58 unexpected R_TLS_LE relocation for darwin
go tool dist: FAILED: /Users/builder/workspace/darwin-amd64-cheney-264858c46e9d/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6l -o /Users/builder/workspace/darwin-amd64-cheney-264858c46e9d/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/go_bootstrap /var/folders/q5/9m80sxt95q19qcx8r96_vqlr0000gp/T/go-tool-dist-498933887/_go_.a: exit status 1
```
